mapper.insert: insert into ordersreview (or_customerId, or_ordersId, or_ordersStatus, oreviewContent, oreviewStarRating, oreviewImage, or_cakeId, oreviewInitdate, or_goodsId) values (#{or_customerId}, #{or_ordersId}, "제작완료", #{oreviewContent}, #{oreviewStarRating}, #{oreviewImage}, #{or_cakeId}, now(), 1);
